Rulings.Base:
1. This card does not target.
2. You must control at least 1 Token and there must be at least 1 other card on the field in order to activate this card.
3. Destroying the Tokens is not a cost.
4. You destroy the Tokens, then destroy cards. The effects are not simultaneous.
5. Tokens you control that are equipped to "Relinquished" also count for this effect.
6. If you control at least 2 Tokens or 1 Token and 1 other card that can be destroyed, you can Chain "Starlight Road" to your own "Token Sundae".
